title: "From robots to recycled vapes"
excerpt: "Close to the Polish border, a company called Citius-S is converting six-wheel drive cargo trucks into armoured vehicles for clearing land mines and unexploded ordinance. The State Emergency Service of Ukraine saw the prototype in action last month and ordered 33 units, according to the company."
